about_the_game:
The unique Birding Simulator hits Steam with an amazing ornithological journey full of memorable adventures. You can discover beautiful bird species and photograph them in a virtual, North American-based world. This simulator lets you experience the realistically reproduced mechanics and aspects of photography and bird watching. Dive deep into the world of wildlife and get up close to birds in their natural habitat.

FEATURES:

  • 📸 The photographing system that focuses on realism
  • 🌳 Several biomes with different vegetation types
  • 🐦 Varied and unpredictable behavior of birds
  • 🚧 Oppose the corporation save the endangered nature reserve
  • 🔊 Take into account the sounds you make and don’t scare the birds away
  • 🏅 Try to take the best photos and earn the highest marks
  • ⚙️ Adjust the camera settings to your needs and the prevailing conditions
  • 🦅 Become the best Birder or Photographer in the world!



Discover a variety of meticulously crafted locations and travel through rich biomes: natural forests, wetlands, swamps, and hills. Explore uncharted, eco-friendly places in the heart of nature. Make your mark by keeping a travel diary and taking photos of newly-discovered bird species. Play the role of a professional birder and photographer, collecting pictures of various bird species famous for their plumage and rarity.



Adjust all necessary camera parameters accordingly, choose the right lens, distance the tripod, observe nature's beauty, and take magical photos. Experience incredible realism, thanks to the mechanics of photographing and tracking birds. Each bird species looks phenomenal in the natural environments – take advantage of that.



Discover realistically reproduced bird species in dozens of virtual locations. Learn about their natural behavior and origins, observe them in their authentic environment, and – most of all – capture as many as possible in the best photos. It doesn't matter that small, medium, large, popular, rare, undiscovered – find and photo them all!



Participate in the story of a businessman who returns to his family home and discovers an ecological threat to the nearby forest. The compelling and extensive storyline, complemented by the real-life simulator, will allow you to go through the various stages of the hero's life: from learning photography, through childhood love, to a rescue mission in the endangered forest.

Ready to take a photo of birds? Follow our Social profiles and add the game to your wishlist!
detailed_description:
Other Games




About the Game



The unique Birding Simulator hits Steam with an amazing ornithological journey full of memorable adventures. You can discover beautiful bird species and photograph them in a virtual, North American-based world. This simulator lets you experience the realistically reproduced mechanics and aspects of photography and bird watching. Dive deep into the world of wildlife and get up close to birds in their natural habitat.

FEATURES:

  • 📸 The photographing system that focuses on realism
  • 🌳 Several biomes with different vegetation types
  • 🐦 Varied and unpredictable behavior of birds
  • 🚧 Oppose the corporation save the endangered nature reserve
  • 🔊 Take into account the sounds you make and don’t scare the birds away
  • 🏅 Try to take the best photos and earn the highest marks
  • ⚙️ Adjust the camera settings to your needs and the prevailing conditions
  • 🦅 Become the best Birder or Photographer in the world!



Discover a variety of meticulously crafted locations and travel through rich biomes: natural forests, wetlands, swamps, and hills. Explore uncharted, eco-friendly places in the heart of nature. Make your mark by keeping a travel diary and taking photos of newly-discovered bird species. Play the role of a professional birder and photographer, collecting pictures of various bird species famous for their plumage and rarity.



Adjust all necessary camera parameters accordingly, choose the right lens, distance the tripod, observe nature's beauty, and take magical photos. Experience incredible realism, thanks to the mechanics of photographing and tracking birds. Each bird species looks phenomenal in the natural environments – take advantage of that.



Discover realistically reproduced bird species in dozens of virtual locations. Learn about their natural behavior and origins, observe them in their authentic environment, and – most of all – capture as many as possible in the best photos. It doesn't matter that small, medium, large, popular, rare, undiscovered – find and photo them all!



Participate in the story of a businessman who returns to his family home and discovers an ecological threat to the nearby forest. The compelling and extensive storyline, complemented by the real-life simulator, will allow you to go through the various stages of the hero's life: from learning photography, through childhood love, to a rescue mission in the endangered forest.

Ready to take a photo of birds? Follow our Social profiles and add the game to your wishlist!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.12.6 (Sierra)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.75 Ghz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB GPU Minimum - GeForce 775M / Radeon HD 6970 / Intel Iris Pro
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

name: Birding Simulator: Bird Photographer

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.5 Ghz or AMD Phenom II 2.6 Ghz or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GTX 960 / ATI HD7870
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatibile Sound Device
  • Additional Notes: Requirements for demo

short_description: Birding Simulator is a first-person photography and exploration game. Get your camera ready, adjust parameters, and gear up to capture unique and rare bird species. Explore varied landscapes and catch incredible moments in your photos. Become the best birder or photographer in the world!🐦
